original_title: Beware Of The Monster - احترس من الوحش
overview: Hassan, a retired man who lives with his wife, Suheir, alone after all their children got married, which causes them to fight a lot. One day, Hassan broke a plate that means a lot to his wife by accident, he tries to find a place to hide it, hoping she’ll never find out.
title: Beware Of The Monster - احترس من الوحش
